thread.title: Europe's migrant crisis: Key questions
thread.title_full: Europe's migrant crisis: Key questions | News24

author: news24.com
title: Europe's migrant crisis: Key questions
text:
Brussels - Europe's refugee and migrant crisis has escalated over the summer, leaving the continent divided over how to deal with a flood of people led by Syrians fleeing war in their homeland.
A record surge in numbers, and the opening up of new routes over the Balkans in addition to the Mediterranean sea route, have prompted the EU to call a special meeting on the issue in two weeks.
Here are the key questions and answers about the biggest crisis of its kind to face Europe since WWII.
WHY IS THE SURGE HAPPENING NOW?
